loot_tables.noPoolsAvailable: There are no pools available in this server.
loot_tables.poolNotFound: Could not find a pool with that name in this server.
loot_tables.poolEmpty: There are no results in this pool to roll on.
loot_tables.resultAddFail:
Whoops, something went wrong trying to add the following result. Process aborted.
(entryDescription)
loot_tables.resultRemoveFail:
Whoops, something went wrong trying to remove the following result. Process aborted.
{entryDescription}
loot_tables.resultRemoveDoesNotExist: Could not remove result. Entry does not exist in pool.
loot_tables.createGlobalAccessDenied: You do not have permission to create global pools.
loot_tables.poolAlreadyExists: Pool with that name already exists.
loot_tables.poolCreatedFail: Whoops, something went wrong trying to create that pool.
loot_tables.poolDeleteNotFound: Pool named `{poolName}` not found in this server.
loot_tables.deleteAccessDenied: You do not have permission to delete that pool.
loot_tables.poolDeleteFail: Whoops, something went wrong trying to remove the pool named {poolName}.

nomic_ime.timeUtcReportString:
It is **{time}** on **{weekday}**, UTC
That means it is **{phase}**

*{nextPhase}* starts on *{nextDay}*, which is roughly {nextDayRelativeTimestampStr}.
That is {nextDayTimestampStr} your time.

reminders.reminderSetShort:
I'll remind you about this at about <t:{timestamp}>.
Use `{prefix}forget {rowId}` to delete this reminder.
reminders.reminderError: An error occurred trying to  set this reminder :(. Some kind of reminder database issue.
reminders.idInvalidError: That is not a valid reminder Id. Please send the integer Id of a reminder that has been made before
reminders.reminderExpired: Reminder {rowId} is old and wasn't going to trigger anyway
reminders.deleteSuccess: You will no longer be reminded of reminder number {rowId}.
reminders.deleteError: An error occurred trying to delete this reminder. Oof.
reminders.deleteUnauthorized: Only an admin or the person who created a reminder can delete it.
reminders.incorrectSyntax1: Incorrect syntax for reminder or I couldn't understand your date format. See `{prefix}help remind` for more details.
reminders.incorrectSyntax2: Couldn't understand your time format or you might have an extra semicolon in there confusing things. See `{PREFIX}help remind` for more details.
reminders.incorrectSyntaxGeneric: Incorrect syntax for reminder. See `{PREFIX}help remind` for more details.
reminders.attemptedTimeTravelError: Please give a time that is in the future (remember that times are in UTC).

stopdoing.bossyResponse:
*"Stop doing nomic", "what time is it?", "trungify this meme", "pool roll some bullshit".*

Don't you all have anything better to do?

dlUpdate.start: There is an update for {prefix}stopdoingnomic, would you like to download it?
dlUpdate.badResponse: well, fine then. be that way I guess...
dlUpdate.responseWaitedTooLong: Well fine then. Ignore me why don't you...
dlUpdate.tryAgainLater: uhh... let's just try that again later
dlUpdate.actuallyWorkedDisbelief: Holy shit it actually worked?? Congrats???
